revisions.rev:
'''MLD''' is usually an abbreviation that can stand for:
'''Terminology:''' *[[Manual lymphatic drainage]] *[[Metachromatic leukodystrophy]] *[[Median lethal dose]] *[[Learning disability|Moderate learning disability]] *[[Multicast Listener Discovery]] *[[Masking Level Difference]] *[[Maniac Latin Disciples]] *Marine Luchtvaart Dienst, the Dutch abbreviation of [[Dutch Naval Aviation Service]] *[[Million Litres per Day]] *[[Mixed Layer Depth]] *[[Multi Lane Distribution]] *[[Air Moldova]] - ICAO airline designator of airline *[[Master List of Documents]] *[[Maritime Laser Demonstrator]] - an on-board laser defense system developed by [[Northrop Grumman]]
{{disambig}} [[de:MLD]] [[it:MLD]]
